title: White Clover
description: At first sight the castle of Australian Andrew McAllisterâ€™s Scottish family looks forbidding. He and his PA, Liz, soon discover secrets the dilapidated castle has held well. Swept back in time a thousand years, to an often hostile world, they are forced to fight for their survival. Among passions and violence they discover untapped strengths in themselves and a love to last forever.
author: Tricia McGill
